text: AHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!
speaker: Aileen

text: Oh my god, what the hell did they do to us?
speaker: Marina

text: Why can’t we move?? We look like a weird spiky avocado.
speaker: Benny

text: Oh my god, what the hell did they do to us?
speaker: Marina

text: Wait a second. Click and drag on our body.
speaker: Benny

text: WOAH. Is that…part of us?
speaker: Aileen

text: We are not letting those corporate clones get away with this!
speaker: Marina

text: Subject 2409, please cooperate.
speaker: Research Intern #105

text: Hell no, we did NOT consent to getting turned into…whatever this is
speaker: Benny

text: I was just getting back into CrossFit, why now???
speaker: Aileen

text: If they want an experiment, we’ll experiment. Let’s mess with them and click and drag to block their way.
speaker: Marina

text: Guys, am I crazy or does he taste delicious?
speaker: Aileen

text: Yeah, his flavour has this unami mouthfeel.
speaker: Benny

text: Meh, I prefer steak.
speaker: Marina

text: Nooooo I don’t have insurance! The medical bills will kill me and I can't afford a clone body!
speaker: Scientist Doug #46

text: Aughhh! I am not paid enough for this!
speaker: Scientist Dougie

text: This was NOT in the workplace hazard training!
speaker: Scientist Douglan

text: UGHHH I hate dying from these experiments! Now I gotta get reimbursed for a new clone body.
speaker: Scientist Doug #719

text: I delegate my duties to Scientist Doug #242!
speaker: Supervisor Doug #87

text: Dang it, I JUST got promoted and now this?!
speaker: Supervisor Doug #242

text: NOOOO, I forgot to fill in the paperwork for a replacement clone body in case of death!
speaker: Scientist Doug #31

text: Our shareholders cannot know about this! Take the subject down, use lethal force if necessary.
speaker: Supervisor Doug #6

text: BEEP! SURRENDER NOW TERRORIST.
speaker: Laserbot

text: Woah, I was born here.
speaker: Benny

text: I have a work visa.
speaker: Aileen

text: WATCH OUT FOR THE LASERS!
speaker: Marina

text: I pulled so many all-nighters for this company and they turn me into THIS?!
speaker: Marina
description: Out of energy waiting for reload 1

text: Growing a tentacle is the biggest career advancement I’ve had this past year.
speaker: Aileen

text: Worst internship ever...I can’t wait until we have enough energy to give them some more payback.
speaker: Benny

text: I had PLANS before turning into this thing! I wanted to win the Nobel prize!
speaker: Marina
description: Out of energy waiting for reload 2

text: I didn’t think my life would turn out this way, but at least I didn't turn into a corporate clone.
speaker: Benny

text: Being a monster is not that bad. Definitely more fun than paperwork.
speaker: Aileen

text: I always thought it was weird the only employees here are all clones except us
speaker: Aileen
description: Out of energy waiting for reload 3

text: Not cool of them to give us that mystery sugar.
speaker: Benny

text: I wonder what was in it? Maybe I could continue research as the world's first monster scientist...
speaker: Marina

text: Let's try and get out of this room, maybe we'll get some answers.
speaker: Marina
description: Out of energy waiting for reload 4 / hint next level?

text: What's the point, we're a FREAKING UGLY HORRIFYING monster!!
speaker: Aileen

text: Hey, I don't appreciate you body shaming us.
